channel.title: Emulous 1.6 FULL 100% DUEL ARENA! RULES ALL! PERFECT PVP!
channel.description:
[img]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/3457/emulous16lk3.png[/img]
Video: [url=http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=I-QWHgzGIQ0]http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=I-QWHgzGIQ0[/url]
Virus scan: [url=http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/2273/virusscanlw5.png]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/2273/virusscanlw5.png[/url]
Version 1.6: 20/01/09 - DUEL ARENA! 90% i think but in terms of what noobs say about their own arena this is 100%1!1! duel arena tele is in quest tab - circle (armour) rules consider how many spaces u and your opponent have left. With the circle rules once you start the duel the items will be un-wielded and placed in your inventory, you won't be able to wear them though. - other rules like no range, no magic work, fun weapons can be added in config.java file, obstacles teleport u to the different arena. - offering 1, 5, 10, all and X all work - 3 2 1 fight thingy xD - second screen works and tells you about the stake + rules you have - head icon hints work if you use bluurs client - forfeiting works, you can't drop items or attack other players, if you x out your opponent wins the duel. - claiming items, if you don't have enough space the items will be dropped on the ground.
Other things: - items requirements - 2handed weapons + shield fix - friends list, private messaging. - clicking objects or npcs with shops now walks to them and opens them up - change character appearance works, it will load when u start playing. - you can enable bluurs client in the config.java, change the value to a true and the skull icon to a false and it will allow you to use hints and the correct skull.
[b]Download:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/FYKKNX]http://uppit.com/FYKKNX[/url] 1.6.2 [url=http://uppit.com/RU6YXC]http://uppit.com/RU6YXC[/url] 1.6.1 [url=http://uppit.com/PPKBAC]1.6[/url]
more pics:
[img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/2838/combatdisplayfg7.png[/img]
[img]http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/6568/14updatebz6.png[/img]
[img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/8175/version15ag4.png[/img]

item.title: Emulous 1.6 FULL 100% DUEL ARENA! RULES ALL! PERFECT PVP!
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Everyone who is posting saying “it’s nothing special,” Or “It’s nothing new.” You people are completely ignorant. Do you have any Idea of the difference between the programming behind your Sh*t servers and the one Hayzie is releasing? He tore down the framework and built it up. This is a completely different for then what you can even comprehend because you don’t even have any basic knowledge of Java or Java Conventions if you say this is the same. If everyone dropped all their shitty sources and use this, the community will see MUCH more stable servers and sources.

So way to go making fools of yourselves by saying this is nothing special. Look at Verek, he made RS2D and it is stickied, you know why? It’s different framework, more stable, and actually took some EFFORT to make.

What? Effort?!?!?!

A concept most of you don’t understand.

Read full topic
